thread.title: Sofia Taveira

author: Sofia Taveira
title: Sofia Taveira
text: My order 193677 for a Redmi Note 4 in Black was a perfect experience. Not only they had the colour I was looking for a the prices are excelent. Ordered and received it the next day, super fast delivery. RN4 is an amazing phone, my first experience with Xiaomi and MIUI and I'm loving it. Fingerprint works amazingly well and the battery lasts me 2 days without any issue. Xiaomi indeed has great mobiles for competitive prices. The phone is very elegant and good quality. Happy, happy, happy :)
